tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had an issue with 3 teeth, after being exposed to cavity for a very long time, these teeth started decaying and at the end only the roots remained with the gum. I was unable to chew anything from that side. I was afraid of injections in my gum as I felt it to be very sensitive hence I delayed my visit to dentists. But the major problem came when I was about to get married and if I tried to smile for any of the pre wedding photoshoot, my pictures will appear very weird due to the missing teeth and I didn't like it. 
That's the time when I approached Dr. Santhosh and Dr. Shilpa. I explained them about my issue and my fear of infections. First, they analyzed the teeth by doing an x-ray and then explained all the possible solutions with time period from the begining till the end. I felt relaxed and was confident to start the process. They also kept us informed about all the other options if I am too afraid of the treatment. But, I was ready as I had faith on them for their knowledge and the way they were handling my case. It took multiple sittings to remove the roots from the missing teeth, let the gum heal. As I was nearing my wedding date, I wanted to get it done soon and I discussed this with them. They suggested about immediate implant after a CBCT of my bone in the gum to see if it is safe to do it sooner or not. And they were able to. I was so happy.
It's been 6 months of my treatment and my implants are still doing good, I didn't face any problem yet. And if I face, i am sure, I can depend on these 2 doctors at any point of time.
P.S -  always had a trust issue on finding a good doctor who will understand my problem and genuinely help me instead of demanding a lot of money from me and consider me a merely an opportunity for cash.
But, I was so happy when I found Dr. Santhosh and Dr. Shilpa.  They helped me a lot. They are also a power couple. Thank you both of you.
reply_text: Thank you for detailed feedback, It motivates us to do the best to the patients, humbled by the kind words

review:

They provide extremely satisfactory treatment, they never ever ever charge anything unnecessarily. 
Treatment cost is very much standard even I would say cheaper than others when we compared to the Quality of the service they provide. 

They resolved lot my dental issues and they are my family dentist now. Any dental issues for my family and friends I always take them to their clinic. 

I strongly recommend to visit the clinic for any dental issues, I am sure you will love the treatment.

review:

I am still observing my root canal treatment done by her, however, I am sure it is taken care of by good hands. I recommend her!

I also wish her the best for her dental clinic to excel higher as I understand some part of running a dental clinic is a bit challenging!

Nilabh :)

review:
Had a very pleasant experience with Dr Santosh and Dr Shilpa. Went for tooth extraction and RCT. 
Both procedures were done with extreme care. 
Dr Santosh and Dr Shilpa are thorough professionals. 
They put me at ease and calmed me down understanding that i was nervous and afraid of the procedures.
Both procedures were painless and performed with precision and care. My notion of visiting dentists have completely changed after visiting Dental32 clinic. 
Would definately recommend Dr Santosh and Dr Shilpa
